title: Something is wrong with SAE converter, strange artifacts...
body:
THIS IS NOT TECH SUPPORT FOR NEWBIE FAKERS
POST ONLY ISSUES RELATED TO BUGS OR CODE

## Expected behavior

Just merging as usual.

## Actual behavior

**Video showing the issue:** https://streamable.com/zc68x
